name: UFGSignCanvasWidget
comment: Custom widget that contains a canvas panel widget for holding sign design elements

methods.name: GetCanvasToComponentLocation
methods.comment: Returns the correct local component location of a canvas element

methods.name: GetBorderSelectionBrush
methods.comment: Get Border brush to apply to selected canvas elements

methods.name: ApplySignData
methods.comment: Called to apply sign data back to the world sign

methods.name: OnElementBeginDrag
methods.comment: Called by the dragged element, spawns the drag widget

methods.name: OnElementDrop
methods.comment: Called by the element being dragged from its NativeOnDrop

methods.name: SetCanvasSize
methods.comment: Called to set the size of the canvas size box to match the world size of the sign

properties.name: mCanvasSizeBox
properties.comment:
/
Size Box that holds our Canvas, its size is set to absolute and the canvas fills that space

properties.name: mCanvasPanel
properties.comment: The canvas panel where actual sign elements will be added

properties.name: mSelectedElement
properties.comment: Reference to the currently selected widget
